tagline: Four days through Kenya's Maasai Mara. Zebras on course.

course.terrain_type: Red volcanic dust and savanna trails
course.terrain_surface: Red volcanic dust, hard-packed savanna trails, game reserve roads. Unfamiliar surfaces demand adaptation.
course.signature_challenge: It's not one thing—it's everything. Heat. Altitude. Dust. Distance. Wildlife. Four days of sensory overload.
course.character: Four days through the Maasai Mara ecosystem. Wildlife crossings. Cultural immersion. Volcanic terrain. It's a safari with a timing chip.
key_features: Active game reserve riding (wildlife on course)

suffering_zones.label: Day 1 - Savanna Introduction
suffering_zones.desc: 150km across the open Mara. The scale hits you. So does the dust.
suffering_zones.terrain_detail: First exposure to volcanic dust and savanna terrain

suffering_zones.label: Day 2 - Volcanic Highlands
suffering_zones.desc: Climbing into the highlands. Altitude starts to bite. Heat doesn't quit.

suffering_zones.label: Day 3 - Queen Stage
suffering_zones.desc: The longest, hardest day. Remote. Exposed. Beautiful. Breaking point for many.
suffering_zones.terrain_detail: Cumulative fatigue from Days 1-2 hits hardest

suffering_zones.label: Day 4 - Victory Lap
suffering_zones.desc: Final stage to finish. Wildebeest may join your peloton. Not a joke.
suffering_zones.terrain_detail: Wildlife encounters, final push to finish

course.climate_description: 15-30°C (59-86°F), equatorial sun, possible afternoon storms. Heat + altitude combination that compounds daily.

biased_opinion.summary: Migration isn't a race you do for a time or placing. It's a race you do for the experience. Four days through Kenya's Maasai Mara with full support, wildlife encounters, and landscapes that rewire your brain. If bucket-list gravel exists, this is it.

logistics.parking: N/A - airport transfers included in package
logistics.registration: Limited field, sells out quickly. Cost: €4,000-5,000 all-inclusive

random_facts: Zebras and giraffes literally on course
Safari lodges serve as race accommodation
Proceeds support Safari Simbaz cycling development in Kenya
Four days of 150km+ stages = cumulative fatigue unlike single-day events

training_plans.race_challenge_tagline: heat, altitude, and cumulative fatigue across four days

seo.title: Migration Gravel Race Guide | Training Plans & Maasai Mara Course Intel
seo.meta_description: Migration Gravel Race Maasai Mara guide: 404-mile 4-day Kenya gravel race. Heat, altitude, and wildlife encounters. Get training plans & course breakdown.
